definition: Supervised practice with immediate feedback and support before independent application

positive_examples: Try the next problem while I watch and give you feedback.
Let's work through a few examples together before you do some on your own.
I'll observe your technique and correct any errors as you practice.
We do, then you do with my guidance, then you do independently.
negative_examples: Watch the video lecture at home.
training_hints.disambiguation: Supervised practice with feedback, not independent work
